about_the_game:
Cute creative Christmas and New Year pixel-arts to maintain a magical atmosphere on your computer!

Special pixel images are prepared by the author of the game especially for you.

The following works will be presented: Deer Affairs, Santa's Secret, a good bad evil child, how to get parents for the new year and much more.
